level.heading: Restriction on job training program combined with sprinkler installation program.
level.text: Any job training programs chosen to be combined with a sprinkler installation program shall perform their job training activities within the District of Columbia.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 5-183
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-183, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 3-1101.
